logistics.name: Logistics & Transportation

attributes.attribute_description: The address where goods will be collected
The destination address for delivery
Classification of goods - one of these 4 values - Electronics, Fragile, Documents, General
Priority level - can be Standard, Express, or Urgent
Weight of the package in kg
Phone number for delivery coordination

test_messages: I need to send a laptop from 123 Main Street to 456 Oak Avenue. It's urgent and weighs about 2kg.
Pick up some fragile items from downtown office, deliver to residential area
Standard delivery of documents from corporate building to law firm
My phone is 555-0123 for coordination

healthcare.name: Healthcare Services

attributes.attribute_description: Full name of the patient
Type of medical appointment - Consultation, Checkup, Emergency, Surgery
Name of preferred healthcare provider
Patient insurance identification number
Phone number for emergency contact
Brief description of health issue or reason for visit

test_messages: Hi, I'm John Smith and I need an emergency appointment. My insurance ID is HC123456
Schedule a checkup with Dr. Wilson for Sarah Johnson
I have chest pain and need urgent consultation
Emergency contact is 555-0123

real_estate.name: Real Estate Services
real_estate.description: Property search and real estate transactions

attributes.attribute_description: Type of property - House, Apartment, Condo, Townhouse, Commercial
Price range for property search
Desired neighborhood or area
Required number of bedrooms
Preferred move-in timeline
Desired features like garage, pool, garden, etc.

test_messages: Looking for a 3-bedroom house in downtown area, budget is $300k-500k
I want an apartment in the suburbs, 2 bedrooms preferred
Need to move in by next month, prefer a place with garage
Looking for commercial property with parking

ecommerce.name: E-Commerce Platform

attributes.attribute_description: Type of product - Electronics, Clothing, Books, Home, Sports
Delivery address for orders
Preferred payment option - Credit Card, PayPal, Bank Transfer
Total value of the order
Delivery timing preference - Standard, Express, Next Day

test_messages: I want to buy electronics worth $500, ship to 789 Pine Street
Looking for sports equipment, will use PayPal
Need express delivery to my office address
Order books for $50, pay with credit card

financial.name: Financial Services

attributes.attribute_description: Type of financial service - Loan, Investment, Insurance, Banking
Client's yearly income
Investment risk preference - Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive
Email address for correspondence
Requested loan amount

test_messages: I'm interested in investment services, my income is $75000 annually
I prefer moderate risk, contact me at john@email.com
Need a loan of $50000 for home purchase
Looking for conservative investment options

education.name: Education Platform

attributes.attribute_description: Academic level - Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, Expert
Area of study - Mathematics, Science, Arts, Technology, Business
Preferred learning format - Online, In-Person, Hybrid
Age of the student
Preferred class timing - Morning, Afternoon, Evening, Weekend

test_messages: I'm 25 years old and want to learn advanced mathematics online
Looking for beginner technology courses, prefer in-person classes
Need weekend business courses for working professionals
Want science courses in the evening

custom.name: Custom Client Configuration
custom.description: Template for creating your own client attributes

attributes.attribute_description: Example of classification attribute - Type A, Type B, Type C
Example of location-based attribute
Example of contact information attribute

test_messages: Add your own test messages here
Customize this configuration for your client
Test with different attribute combinations

attribute_design: Provide clear attribute_display_name for user interaction
Write detailed attribute_description for AI extraction
Keep descriptions specific to improve extraction accuracy
message_testing: Include multiple attributes in single messages
Test edge cases and ambiguous inputs
Verify extraction with different sentence structures
Test both explicit and implicit attribute mentions
validation_tips: Check that extracted values match expected format
Verify classification values match predefined options
Test with missing, partial, and complete information
Validate that system handles unknown attributes gracefully
Ensure change detection works for existing attributes
